SA15arhebt_u:340_1: ādigrahaṇāt `kākasya kārṣṇyāt' ityādi vyadhikaraṇāsiddhaṃ parihṛtaṃ hetutvena nirastaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:341: dharmidharma iti tu sāmānye[nābhi]dhānāt teṣām api hetutā syād[57]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:343: tato 'narthaka evopacāra ity āha paraḥ -- dharmavacanenāpi na kevalaṃ dha[rmiva]canena /
SA15arhebt_u:344: dharmyāśrayasiddhau dharmiṇa āśrayaṇam āśrayaḥ parigrahas tasya siddhis tasyāṃ satyām /
SA15arhebt_u:345: kiṃ punar ddharmasya dharmyākṣepanimittam iti cet[59]?
SA15arhebt_u:346: parā[śrayatvā]t -- dharmiparatantratvāt dharmasya avaśyam asau dharmiṇam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:347: tato dharmivacanam atiricyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sādhyadharmiṇam eva pratipādayati,
SA15arhebt_u:349: syān matam -- dharmigrahaṇād viśiṣṭo 'tra dharmī kaścid abhipreta iti gamyate,
SA15arhebt_u:350: sa tu sādhyadharmīti kuta ity āha -- pratyāsatter nyāyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:358: kadācid[62]vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy api prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:359: yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:360: yataḥ tadaṃśavyāptyā hetubhūtayā dṛṣṭāntadharmini dharmasya satva(ttva)siddheḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:361: na hi [T. 214a.] dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayituṃ śakyata iti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:362: tato dharmigrahaṇād vyatiricyamānāt sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigrahaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:363: tadaṃśena iti ca tacchabdena dharmavacanākṣipto dharmī sambhantsyata iti tatsambhandhanārtham api dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:364: yatra prayojanāntaraṃ na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyaviṣayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:365: dharmivacanasya tv anyad api prayojanaṃ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt_u:367: iti manyamānaḥsiddhāntavādy āha -- siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyādṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi satva(ttve)
SA15arhebt_u:368: punar ddharmiṇo [S. 14a.] vacanaṃdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥsa hetur iti niyamārthamāśaṅkyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:370: na kṛtakatvādaya iti aniṣṭam eva syāt tasmād upacāraḥkartavyaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:371: kiṃ punastarkkaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ kvacit niyamārthavacanam ity ata āha -- dṛṣṭaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:373: tatra yaḥ[63] san sajātīye[64] -- [NMu 7] ity atrā ''cāryīye hetulakṣaṇe `sajātīya e[va] satva(ttva)
SA15arhebt_u:374: m' ity avadhāraṇena siddhe 'pi hetor vyatireke /
SA15arhebt_u:377: vacanaṃ tanniyamārthamācāryeṇa vyākhyāta[m a]saty[65]eva nāstitā yathā syāt nānyatra na viruddha iti /
SA15arhebt_u:387: tathā hi -- sādhyadharmeṇa vyāpto 'pi dharmo yadi kvacid dharmiṇy upalabhyeta tadā tatraiva svavyāpakapratītiṃ janayet nānyatra [pratyā]sattiviprakarṣābhyāṃ yathākramam /
SA15arhebt_u:388: anupalabdhas tu kvacid dharmiṇi kathaṃ gamakaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:389: tathābhāve[67]vā sarvatra svavyāpakaṃ gamayet pratyāsattiviprakarṣābhāvād e[vety ata] āha -- tasmāt sāmarthyāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:390: yad idam anantaraṃ sāmarthyaṃ samupavarṇitam asmāt sāmarthyād arthasya sādhyadharmiparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratīti[r pa]ṭudhiyāṃ śrotṝṇām,
SA15arhebt_u:391: kintv aśabdakam arthaṃ svayam anusaratāṃ pratipattigauravaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:392: tadupacāramātrāt svayam aśabdakārthābhyūharahitād dharmidharma ity ane[na pa]kṣadharma iti {1}samānirddeśāt
SA15arhebt_u:394: {2}pratipattigauravaṃca iti caśabdenaitad āha -- ye paropadeśam ākāṅkṣanti,
SA15arhebt_u:395: tair ayam artho lakṣaṇa[vaca]nād boddhavya iti.[S.15a.]
SA15arhebt_u:396: yathālakṣaṇaṃ pratīter apakṣadharmo na hetur iti kutaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:403: [60] yasya kasyacid dharmiṇo dharmasya hetutvam iti vyāptinyāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:411: [63] yaḥ san sajātīye sapakṣe san vidyamānas tadatyaye sādhyasyābhāve vipakṣe ca dvedhā'san sad asan yadi na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:412: kintv asann eva vipakṣe yadi bhavati tadaiva samyag ghetur iti bhāvaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:413: [64] yaḥsan sajātīye 'san tadatyaya itidignāgācāryīyaṃsūtraṃ vyākhyātam atra
SA15arhebt_u:414: [65] abhāvarūpa anyarūpe viruddharūpe vā nāstitā yasya sa hetur ity arthaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:421: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāc ca pakṣadharma ity atra nānyaḥ samāsaḥ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:422: tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharma [i]ty evam avadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptir virudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatām udbhāvayann āha -- [T. 215a.] pakṣasya dharmatve tvaṃ(taṃ)
SA15arhebt_u:423: pakṣaṃviśeṣaṇam anyato vyavacchedakam apekṣata iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya dharmasya anyatra pakṣīkṛtād anyasmin sapakṣe ananuvṛttiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:424: tathā hi -- yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati nānya[sya] /
SA15arhebt_u:425: yathā -- yo devadattasya putraḥ sa tasyaiva putro na yajñadattasyāpi /
SA15arhebt_u:430: tato yadi pakṣadharmo na ta[daṃśe]na vyāptiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:431: [S. 15b.] atha tadaṃśavyāptir na pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:432: nanu ca tadaṃśavyāptir nāma sādhyadharmasya vyāpakasya tatra hetau sati tadādhāradharmiṇi bhāva eva,
SA15arhebt_u:433: vyāpyasya vā hetos tatraiva vyāpake sādhyadharme saty eva bhāva iti svasādhyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā vakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:434: na cānayā 'vaśyaṃ pakṣīkṛtād anyatra vṛttir ākṣipyate,
SA15arhebt_u:436: tathā hi -- tatraiva pakṣīkṛte saty eva sādhyadharme hetur varttamānas tadaṃśavyāptiṃ pratipadyata eva /
SA15arhebt_u:437: yaiva cāsya sādhyadharmiṇi svasādhyāvinābhāvitā saiva gamakatve nibandhanaṃ nānyadharmiṇi /
SA15arhebt_u:439: na sapakṣe kvacid bahulaṃ vā sahabhāvamātradarśananibandhanaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:440: na hi lohalekhyaṃ vajram pārthivatvāt kāṣṭhādivat iti tadanyatra pārthivatvasya [T. 215b.] lohalekhyatā 'vinābhāvo 'pi tathābhāvo bhavati [S. 16a.] /
SA15arhebt_u:441: yadi ca pakṣīkṛtād anyatraiva vyāptir ādarśayitavyeti niyamas tadā satvaṃ(ttvaṃ)
SA15arhebt_u:446: yad api kaiścit jvālādeḥ kṣaṇikatvam abhyupagamyate tad api na pratyakṣataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:448: anyatraiva ca vyāptir ādarśanīyā na sādhyadharmiṇy apīti ko 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:451: tasmāt svasādhyapratibandhād hetus tena vyāptaḥ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:452: sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇy api sidhyatīti na kiñcid
SA15arhebt_u:454: ata evānyatroktam[71]-- [S. 16b.] yat[72]kvacid[73] dṛṣṭaṃ[74] tasya[75] yatra[76] pratibandhaḥtadvidhaḥ[77] tasya[78] tad[79] gamakaṃtatreti[80] vastugatiḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:469: yad api anumeye 'tha tattulye sadbhāvaḥ-- ity[81]ādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāpi sādhyadharmavān[82]eva sapakṣa ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:470: tataḥ satyeva sādhyadharme vā 'stīty evaṃ param etat /
SA15arhebt_u:471: tataś ca taddharmaṇaḥ sādhyadharmiṇo 'pi vāstavaṃ sapakṣatvaṃ na vyāvarttate /
SA15arhebt_u:473: tasmāt tadaṃśavyāptivacanena svasādhyāvinābhāvitvasya pratibandhanibandhanasyānyathā tadayogād[83]abhidhānān nāvaśya[T. 216a.]m anyatra vṛttir ākṣipteti,
SA15arhebt_u:476: yadi sarvasya hetoḥ pakṣīkṛte eva dharmiṇi svasādhyapratibandhaḥ pramāṇato niścetuṃ śakyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:477: [S. 17a.] yathā sattvalakṣaṇasya svabhāvahetoḥ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ tādātmyaṃ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā /
SA15arhebt_u:481: tasmāt tasyānyatraiva[84][prasiddhir iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya tatra apekṣaṇāt anya]trānanuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇatā sambhavamātreṇāśaṅkitā /
SA15arhebt_u:490: yatra dharmiṇi dha]rmasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃdihyate tatrā 'yogavyavacchedasya nyāyaprāptatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:492: caitre hi dhanurdhara]tvaṃ saṃdihyate kim asti nāsti iti /
SA15arhebt_u:493: tataś caitro dhanurddhara iti tatsadbhāvapratipādikā śrutiḥ [T. 216b.] [pakṣāntaram adhanurdharatvaṃ śrotur āśaṅkopasthāpitaṃ] nirākarotīty ayogavyavacchedo 'tra nyāyaprāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:498: iha pārthe] hi dhanurddharatvaṃ siddham eveti nāyogāśaṅkā /
SA15arhebt_u:500: nāstīty anyayoga[śaṅkāyāṃ śrotuḥ yadā pārtho dhanurdhara iti ucya]te tadā 'nyayogavyavacchedo nyāyaprāptaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:501: pratipādyāśaṅkopasthāpitayor eva pakṣayoḥ para[sparaṃ virodhāt ekanirdeśena anyayogavyavacchedasya] nyāyabalāyātatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:502: tad iha pakṣe 'sty ayaṃ dharmo na veti saṃśītau [pakṣadharma ity ukte pakṣasya dharma eva [S. 18b.] nādharmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:503: dharmaś ca āśritatvād viśeṣaṇaṃ tenāyogo vya]vacchidyate nānyayogas tadaṃśavyāptyā tasya pratipādita[tvena dṛṣṭānte saṃdehābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:509: na tadaṃśaḥ tasya ca eka]deśābhāvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:518: tatra ca so 'sādhāraṇo dharmo yasya tasyeti vyākhyeyam /
SA15arhebt_u:522: [86] prāk pravṛttaṃ ca tat gṛhītaṃ tad vismṛtaṃ ca tat pratibandhasādhakapramāṇaṃ ca tasya smṛtaya iti samāsaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:525: tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiḥ -- yo vyāpnoti yaś ca vyāpyate [tadubhayadharmatayā[87]pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:526: yadā vyāpakadharmatayā vivakṣyate ta]dā vyāpakasya gamyasya[88]/
SA15arhebt_u:527: tatreti [T. 217a.] sat saptamy arthapradhānam etat nādhārapradhānam,
SA15arhebt_u:529: {p. 18.1} tenāyam arthaḥ -- yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyam asti tatra sarvvatra bhāva eva[89]vyāpakasya svagato dharmo vyāptiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:538: vivakṣā vyāptes tadā vyāpyasya vā gamakasya tatraiva vyāpake gamye sati /
SA15arhebt_u:541: atrāpi vyāpyasyaiva tatra bhāva ity avadhāraṇaṃ hetvabhāvaprasakter[94]eva nāśritam,
SA15arhebt_u:547: tu vyāpter ubhayatra [S. 19b.] tulyadharmatayaikākārā pratītiḥ saṃyogivat mā bhūd iti pradarśanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:548: tathā hi -- pūrvatrāyogavyavacchedenāvadhāraṇam [T. 217b.] uttaratrānyayogavyavacchedeneti kuta ubhayatraikākāratā vyāpteḥ? / taduktam --
SA15arhebt_u:549: liṅge liṅgībhavaty eva liṅginy evetarat punaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:552: na ca kenacid aṃśena na saṃyogīhutāśanaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:553: dhūmo vāsarvathā[99] tena prāptaṃdhūmāt prakāśanam // iti /
SA15arhebt_u:555: tathā hi -- saṃyogasya ubhayatrāviśeṣāt eṣa prasaṅgo na tu vyāpteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:557: {p. 19.1} vyāpakadharme vyāptiḥ tādṛśy eva vyāpyadharma iti / tathā cāha -
SA15arhebt_u:559: ādhārādheyavad vṛttis tasya saṃyogivan na tu // iti / [S. 20a.]
SA15arhebt_u:560: tena vyāpako vyāpyo na bhavati vyāpyaś ca [na] vyāpaka iti /
SA15arhebt_u:561: tadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ iti vacanāt na saṃyogipakṣokto doṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:579: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmo api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:580: dhūmasyāpi dhūmatvapaṇḍutvādiviśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmāḥ gamakā bhaveyuḥ saṃyogasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt
SA15arhebt_u:583: yadi tarhi pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ ity etad dhetulakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ tadaṃśavyāptiś ceti dvirūpo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:584: anyatra ca trirūpa uktaḥ tat kathaṃ na vyāghātaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:585: ity āha etena tadaṃśavyāptivacanena anvayo vyatireko vāuktaḥ veditavya iti sambandhaḥ [T. 218a.] /
SA15arhebt_u:587: tathā hi -- ya[100]eva yenānvito[101]yan[102]nivṛttau ca nivṛttate sa[103]eva tena[104]vyāpta ucyata iti tadātmakatvād vyāpter vyāptivacanenānvayavyatirekābhidhānam /
SA15arhebt_u:588: tato vyāptivacanena rūpadvayābhidhānāt na vyāghāta iti / [S. 20b.]
SA15arhebt_u:598: niścayaśca tayor naikenaiva pramāṇena api tu yathāsvam /
SA15arhebt_u:599: yasya yad ātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ niścāyakaṃ tena /
SA15arhebt_u:600: yasya ca yat niścāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad uttaratra vakṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:602: tena sādharmyavaidharmyavatoḥ prayogayor ekenaiva dvitīyagater vidhipratiṣedharūpatayā vyāvṛttibhede 'pi paramārthatas tādātmyāt nobhayopadarśanam iti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:603: vyatireko hi sādhyanivṛttau liṅgasya nivṛttidharmakatvaṃ[105]svabhāvabhūto dharma ity anvayarūpatā vastuto 'sya na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:611_1: upacārato niścaya ucyate -- pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasyānadhigatārthādhigantṛtvābhāvaṃ darśayituṃ /
SA15arhebt_u:612: tena yady api sāmānyarūpaṃ liṅgam avasthāpyate tathāpi svalakṣaṇapratītir eva tadvyavasthānibandhanam iti pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi prasiddhir ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:615: / pramāṇaphalabhedāc[107]ca anumānataḥ anumānena niścayaḥ iti āha /
SA15arhebt_u:616: atrodāharaṇe yathākramaṃ yathāpradeśe [Tt. 356a.] dhūmasya dhūmasāmānyasya pratyakṣato niścayaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:619: [106] nanu nirvikalpakena pratyakṣeṇa kathaṃ sāmānyātmano liṅgasya grahaṇam? ity āha
SA15arhebt_u:620: [107] bauddhamate na pramityātmakaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ bhinnaṃ kiñcid asti /
SA15arhebt_u:621: kintu bhedam abhyupagamya anumānena niścaya iti ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:625_0: yas tu manyate -- `yaḥ pradeśo 'gnisambandhī so 'pratyakṣo yas tu pratyakṣo nabhobhagarūpa
SA15arhebt_u:625_1: ālokādyātmā[108]dhūmavat tayā dṛśyamāno na so 'gnimān ataḥ kathaṃ pradeśe dhūmasya
SA15arhebt_u:627: sāgnir ayaṃ dhūmaḥ dhūmatvāt ity evaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ' iti -- tasyāpi sāgneḥ dhūmāvayavasyā 'pratyakṣatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:634: pradeśe eva ca loko 'gniṃ pratipadyate, na dhūme /
SA15arhebt_u:640: [109] dhūmakāle eva cāgniḥ sādhyate na bhasmakāle
SA15arhebt_u:644: atra yathopavarṇitaṃ pratyakṣataḥ [S. 23a.] pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi prasiddhāv abhiprāyam apratipadyamānaḥkumārilaḥ-- `kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa(ṇā)
SA15arhebt_u:645: vikalpena sāmānyātmano liṅgasya dhūmādeḥ svrūpagra[haṇa]m api tāvad yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:646: dharmiṇo vā kuta eva tatsambandhagrahaṇam' -- iti pratyavatasthe /
SA15arhebt_u:647: tena hi pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc cānumānāder ddharmaṃpratyanimittatvam [ŚBh 1.1.4.] ity etadbhāṣyam -
SA15arhebt_u:660: {p. 22.1}[h3]iti bruvatā -- `saugat[h4]ānām evāyaṃ liṅgadharmitatsambandhāgrāhaṇalakṣaṇo doṣo yeṣām avikalpakam eva pratyakṣaṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:661: nāsmākaṃ savikalpam api pratyakṣam icchatām' [S. 23b.] ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:663_0: ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- pratyakṣaṃ hi purovasthitam auttarādharyeṇa dhūmapradeśādikaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:663_4: tayoś cauttarādharyam `evam etat nānyathā' iti vikalpayati /
SA15arhebt_u:665: tato dharmadharmiṇoḥ svarūpaniścayaḥ sambandhaniścayaś ca pratyakṣanibandhanaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:667: tathā hi -- ayam eva dhūmapradeśayoḥ sambandhasya niścayo yaḥ `ātrāyam' ity adhyavasāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:668: sa cāvikalpenāpi pratyakṣeṇa yathoktena prakāreṇa sampādita eva /
SA15arhebt_u:669: na cauttarādharyāvasthitād vastudvayād anya [S. 24a.] eva kaścid ādhā[rādhe]yabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ yataḥ tasya [T. 220b.] pratyakṣeṇānanubhūtatvāt paścāda(d)

SA15arhebt_u:1271: ity āha -- sā vastutas tadbhāvatā sādhyasya viparyayo vipakṣaḥ tatra,
SA15arhebt_u:1275: tasya yā vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ tatsādhyatvāc ca vastutas tadbhāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttir uktā /
SA15arhebt_u:1276: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ [T. 235b.] vipakṣāṭ nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmavaty eva dharmiṇi vartata iti sādhyadharmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:1277_0: tayāca vastutas tadbhāvatayā sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sādhyadharmasya sidhyatīti
SA15arhebt_u:1277_1: [S. 47b.] anvayaniścayaḥ `yatra yatra sādhanadharmas tatra sādhyadharmaḥ' ity evaṃ rūpo jāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:1278: atrodāharaṇaṃ yathā-- yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva /

SA15arhebt_u:1282_2: -- niṣpattis tasyā virodhāt tallakṣaṇaṃ sā 'rthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya vastutvasya
SA15arhebt_u:1285: tad evaṃ vidhaṃ vastutvaṃ hīyate nivartate,
SA15arhebt_u:1287: etac ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhirūpam uttaratrāvasaraprāptaṃ svayam eva vakṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:1288: tadanayā bādhakapramāṇavṛttayā sādhyadharmasya [S. 48a.] vastutaḥ sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:1296: evaṃ svabhāvahetau [T. 236a] viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau pratipādayann āha -- kāryahetau anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:1299: tasya yā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ sā kāryahetāv anvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:1300: yathā ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhir bhavati tathopadarśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:1302: idaṃ dhūmādikam asya agneḥ upalambhe sati upalabhyata iti sambandhaḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:1305: kintu prākpravṛttānupalambhasahāyam iti [S. 48b.] darśāyitum āha -- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam anupalabdham iti /
SA15arhebt_u:1306: yadi tad dhūmādikam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ satsv anyai(nye)
SA15arhebt_u:1308: dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādi(tadagnyādi)
SA15arhebt_u:1311: taddeśasannihitam apy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatayāgnyādisāmagrī sannidhānāt prāganupalabdham iti /
SA15arhebt_u:1316: etāvadbhiś ca prakārair atatkāryatā bhavantī bhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:1318: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidher adṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ity āśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:1331: punaś codye sa eva parihāro 'navasthā ca /
SA15arhebt_u:1333: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānād eva ca dhūmasya tat[211]kāraṇaṃ kalpeta
SA15arhebt_u:1335: tad api tatra kāraṇam astu iti cet; na,
SA15arhebt_u:1341: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:1343: kiṃ rūpaḥ punar asau kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nupalambhasahāya pratyakṣanibandhana ity āha -- tadbhāve bhāvaḥtadabhāve 'bhāvaśca iti /
SA15arhebt_u:1346: tadabhāve kāraṇatvābhimatasyā 'bhāve abhāva[217] eva kāryatvenābhimatasyābhāvaś ca /

SA15arhebt_u:1355: yato nānyayogas teṣāṃ pūrvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt /

SA15arhebt_u:1358: ayaṃ hi bhedo [T. 237b.] bhedahetur vā viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaś ca /
SA15arhebt_u:1360: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:1363: [S. 50b.] tadavasthe eveti na tayor anyayoge 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:1365: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvād anyas tadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyam anubhavet? /

SA15arhebt_u:1395: tadā kṣaṇikatayā kāraṇasya tam[226]eva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt kathaṃ svakāryakriyā? /
SA15arhebt_u:1397: tasmiṃś cāsati katham akāraṇena kāryakāraṇasambandho janyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:1398: atha svakāryaṃ kṛtvā paścāj janyeta tadā 'pi svakāryakāle eva vinaṣṭatvād asatastaduttarakālabhāvikāryakāraṇabhāvajananaṃ kutaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:1400_4: [S. 53a.] janyatāyāṃ vā yadi samagrāḥ svarūpata eva tāṃ janayanti kārye ka eṣāṃ śaktivyāghātaḥ?

SA15arhebt_u:1411: ity āśaṅkya kārya[T.239b.]kāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhanatvād anvayaniścayasya kāraṇe kāryopacārād ananyopāyasādhyatāṃ darśayitum,
SA15arhebt_u:1412_0: darśanamātranibandhanaṃ ye tam icchanti tanmataniṣedhārtham asāv evam ukta iti darśayann

SA15arhebt_u:1419_0: {p. 50.1} atha yadi nāma kāryam agner dhūmas tathāpi kim iti yatrāsau tatrāvaśyam

SA15arhebt_u:4582: sattve 'pi mahattvāder neyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asmākam abhimatā /
SA15arhebt_u:4584_1: śāstrakāro darśayām babhūva [S. 161b.] upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4584_2: kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyād anyasya sā abhāvahetuḥ kāryasya vyāpyasya ca
SA15arhebt_u:4585: yātu pratiṣedhyasyaivopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā 'bhāvavyavahārahetur eveti vāśabdena darśayati / yā tv
SA15arhebt_u:4586: anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4599: tatra ye tāvad upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhim icchanti,
SA15arhebt_u:4600: vijñānaṃvā'nyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti vacanāt tadanyavastuvijñānam eva vā,
SA15arhebt_u:4601_1: eva tāvad dvividhām darśayann āha -- atra anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā
SA15arhebt_u:4601_2: sā yadā kartṛsthatayā 'pekṣyate tadā tasyā upalabhamānasya kartuḥ dharmatve apekṣyamāṇe
SA15arhebt_u:4601_3: tajjñānam upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhir ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4602: upalabhamānaś ca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta[636]upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4603: tathā hi -- upalabdher janaka āśrayo vā karttā parair ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4604: na {p. 170.1} cendriyāder anyasya janakatvaṃ [S. 162a.] sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4605: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāder anyasya sambhavataḥ satsv indriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdher bhāvāt / yadi
SA15arhebt_u:4606: hīndriyādiṣu satsv api kadācid upalabdhir nopajāyate tadā satsv apy anyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tadvyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:4610: 3yasmin sati bhavaty eva yat tato 'nyasya kalpane /
SA15arhebt_u:4611: taddhetutvena sarvatra hetūnām anavasthitiḥ[638]// [PV I 26] iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4612: āśrayatvam api janakasyaiveti tad apy ātmano na sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:4614: kṣāṇikatve sthiter abhāvād upalabdher akṣaṇikatve 'pi svayam evāvināśād avasthānāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4615: tathā hi -- upalabdher avināśa eva sthitir ucyate na pātābhāvaḥ [T. 327b.] tasyā gurutvābhāvāt saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam [VSū V.1.7.] iti capareṣāṃkṛtāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4626: evam upalabdhim ādarśyānupalabdhim ādarśayann āha -- tasmād upalabdhijñānād anyā vastvantaraviṣayā upalabdhiḥ jñānātmikā anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4629: yathā bhakṣyābhakṣyaprakaraṇe vivakṣitād bhakṣyād anyatvād `abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭaḥ' -- bhakṣyo 'pi san tadanyasya -- ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4630: yathā ca sparśanīyāsparśanīyādhikāre vivakṣitāt sparśanīyād anyatvād `asparśanīyaś cāṇḍālādiḥ' -- tadanyasya sparśanīyo 'pi san -- ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4634: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya varjanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttis tayā,
SA15arhebt_u:4636: yatra vidheḥ [S. 163a.] prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāk svapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā
SA15arhebt_u:4637_0: / vidheś ca prādhānyaṃ `vivakṣitopalabdher anyopalabdhir bhavati' ity evaṃ vākyenānyopalabdher
SA15arhebt_u:4637_1: vidhānāt [T. 328a.] anyopalabdhisāmarthyād eva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4638: vivakṣitopalabdher anivarttane tadapekṣayā 'nyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4640: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇā 'nyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhir anupalabdhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4641: nañaś ca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ity ekavākyatvaṃ `na upalabdhir anupalabdhiḥ' iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4643: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhir arthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4644: tad evaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇām anupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayann āha -- upalabhyamānadharmatva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4645: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhir vivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhir mantavyā /
SA15arhebt_u:4648: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder yadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyatā tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4651: dharmadharmiṇoś ca bheda eva ity ata āha -- yogyatāyāḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4652: yogyatā hi paramārthato [T. 328b.] bhāvarūpaiva na vastusvarūpād bhidyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4653: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4654: yogyatā 'syeti ca sambandho bhāvato na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4656: tad evam upalabdher viṣayadharmatāṃ pratipādyānupalabdher api pratipādayann āha tasmād anyaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4657_1: eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4658: prāktanam eva nyāyam atrādiśann[642]āha pūrvavad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4660: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ nañ anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya [S. 164a.] tajjñānasyaiva 3vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ[643]paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati,
SA15arhebt_u:4662: ity ata āha -- yatra yasmin ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4664: yasmin pradeśarūpādau upalabhyamāne niyamena avaśyaṃtayā yasyānyasya
SA15arhebt_u:4665: padārthasya ghaṭrarūpāder upalabdhir bhavati sa ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4669: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarppayati tadā ghaṭarūpam api tatra[644]tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarppayaty eva /
SA15arhebt_u:4670: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthites tu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
SA15arhebt_u:4672: ekatra hi jñāne dvāv api tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4673: tadvijñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram ājāyamānaṃ tayor ātmani saṃsarggaṃ darśayati /
SA15arhebt_u:4674: kim iti punas tat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram avaśyaṃ [S. 164b.] bhavati yatas tayor jñānadvārakaḥ saṃsarggaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4676: / yāv etau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatas tadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattir bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:4678: na hy eṣa sambhavo 'sti -- yat tulyayogyatārūpayor eka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4679: tathā hi -- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kas tatra svākāraṃ na samarppayet? /
SA15arhebt_u:4681: na cānubhavaviruddham ācakṣaṇā viduṣām avadheyavacaso bhavanti /
SA15arhebt_u:4684: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yad ekasminn eva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayati nānekatra,
SA15arhebt_u:4685: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ tato nānekapratipattihetur iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4688: karttrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmāṇīti kathaṃ `karaṇadharmaḥ' ityādi vaco na plavate? /
SA15arhebt_u:4689: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo [S. 165a.] yuktaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4691: na ca sarrvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacid atiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ karttā kā(ka)
SA15arhebt_u:4693: tasmād aviśiṣṭayogyatayoḥ kuta ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4696: na hy asati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapad ekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4697: tatra yeṣāṃsaugatānām idaṃ darśanaṃ `ekāyatanasaṅgṛhīte 'nekatrāpy ekam evendriyajñānam ājāyate' iti teṣāṃ mukhya evaikajñānasaṃsarggaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4698: ye tu `tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnāny evaikendriyanimittāny ekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapat sannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4699_0: ata[646]evaikatayā loke 'dhyavasīyamānāni jñānāny upajāyante` iti varṇayanti [T.
SA15arhebt_u:4700: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsarggāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭasyāpi [S. 165b.] sāmānyena sarvam anyam ayaṃ nañ kin na pratipādayati?
SA15arhebt_u:4702_0: yasmād aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayor api saṃsarggaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4702_1: tasmād aviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇau tau tasmāt tayor
SA15arhebt_u:4702_2: evaṃrūpayoḥ parasparāpekṣam eva na sarvānyapadārthāpekṣam anyatvam iha anupalabdhyadhikāre abhipretam /
SA15arhebt_u:4703: loke tu yady aviśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣam anyatvaṃ nañā kvacid ucyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4705: {p. 174.1} pratyāsatterāśrayaṇāt ekajñānasaṃsarggalakṣaṇā prattyāsattir āśrīyate nā 'nyā pramāṇacintādhikārāt anyathā 'nupalabdhir anaikāntikyeva syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4706: tasmāt tattvacintakais tathāvidham anyatvam āśrayaṇīyam yad anupalabdher avyabhicāranibandhanam /
SA15arhebt_u:4708: tad evam ekajñānasaṃsarggāpekṣayā 'nyatvaṃ pratipādyānupalabdhiṃ darśayann āha -- sa kevalaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4709: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣayā tasmād anya ucyate [S. 166a.] tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ [T. 330b.] vā 'nupalabdhiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4710: na tu yatheśvaraseno manyate upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhir iti,
SA15arhebt_u:4713: na tu tadviviktajñānam eva yathāhakumārilaḥvijñānaṃvānyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4714: yathā hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānam anubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
SA15arhebt_u:4715: tathā hi -- kasyacit pratipattuḥ `yataḥ kevalapradeśākāram eva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāram api tasmād atra ghaṭo nāsti` iti evaṃ nāstitājñānam utpadyate;
SA15arhebt_u:4716: kasyacit tu `yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmān nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity
SA15arhebt_u:4717: evam / tasmād ubhayor nāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyam iti dvayor api anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
SA15arhebt_u:4718: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇā 'nupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyā 'pekṣayā yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā karmasthakriyāpekṣayeti /
SA15arhebt_u:4719: evam anupalabdhiṃ [S. 166b.] paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyā darśayann āha -- sāabhāvam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4720: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi [T. 331a.] pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginy arthitvādibhiḥ smṛtir asya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt_u:4725: tatra `nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākāraṃ jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:4726: evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4727: {p. 175.1} atreśvarasenakumārilayor vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya siddhāntavyavasthām eva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārtham āha -- katham anyabhāva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4728: īśvaraseno hi manyate -- kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇād avaśyam abhāvarūpatvam asyāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4730: tvayā [S. 167a.] cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādes tajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhir ākhyāyate tannūnam anyabhāvas tadabhāvo yenaivam abhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4733: kumārilo 'py evaṃ manyate -- yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhā 'nupalabdhir abhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4734: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ [T. 331b.] pratiṣedhyajñānād anyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4738: saty api dharmirūpeṇābhede tayoś codbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti / yad āha --
SA15arhebt_u:4739: dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥsthite /
SA15arhebt_u:4742: uktottaratām asya darśayann āha -- uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsavṛttyāapekṣātaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4743: `pratiṣedhyaṃ tajjñānaṃ vā apekṣya tadvivikto 'rthas tajjñānaṃ [S. 167b.] vā 'bhāvo 'nupalabdhiś cocyate` itiīśvarasenasya prativacanam /
SA15arhebt_u:4744: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kin tu paryudāso 'pi /
SA15arhebt_u:4750: paramārthatas tu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā {p. 176.1} vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhir bhidyata[649]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4751: yat tu `anapekṣitārthāntarasaṃsarggaṃ pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ` itīśvaraseno manyate tannirākurvann āha -- na pratiṣedhamātram ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4752: kasmāt? ity āha -- tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4753: [T. 332a.] na hy abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasya sādhanatvaṃ siddhihetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA15arhebt_u:4758: abhāvasya [S. 168a.] cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4759: tataś ca sādhakatvāyogād abhāvavyavahāra eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:4760: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcin na sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4761: sa hy abhāvatvād apareṇopalabdhyabhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4767: tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ` ity 4atrāntare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati[651]/
SA15arhebt_u:4768: kumārilasyāpy uttaram āha -- tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastvantareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya /
SA15arhebt_u:4769: na hy asau vastvantaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāva ekarūpaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4770: tathātve hy abhāvāṃśo 'pi na kvacit sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:4771_0: tasyaivaṃvidhasya bhāvasiddhir eva bhāvāṃśasiddhir eva aparasya pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhir
SA15arhebt_u:4771_1: abhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhir astu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatter iti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4772: tathā hi -- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4774: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kim anyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
SA15arhebt_u:4776: yata {p. 177.1} evam iti tasmād anyabhāvo 'pi anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalam abhāvāṃśas tvanmatyā 'bhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4779: yad uktaṃ `jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ`[652]iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:4781: tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ`[653]iti dvitīye vyākhyāne[654]pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[r i]ty 4etasya sādhanaṃ[655]darśayitum āha -- anyabhāvalakṣaṇa ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4782_0: evaṃ manyate -- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvam eva prathamaṃ pratipadyate

SA15arhebt_u:4990: syān matam -- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā [S. 176b.] liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātra prakṛte 'nyabhāve sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanāsambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:4991: yena [T. 339b.] sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ hetur bhaved viśeṣo dharmī,
SA15arhebt_u:4992: yataḥ {p. 186.1} samudāyasādhyatā liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4993: kuto na sambhavatīty āha -- tadviśeṣapratipatter eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipatter eva tadabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4994: yataś ca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4995: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4996: āha -- tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtter abhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4997: na hy asau deśakālāvasthāniyato viśeṣo 'nyam anvetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5002: tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyas tadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5005: atha mā bhūt [S. 177a.] eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo hetur iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5006: kin tu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitam ity ata āha -- na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃtatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5007: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvād anaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5009: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitas tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:5010: tathāvidhapradeśaviśeṣapratītir eva ghaṭābhāvapratītis tato 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ liṅgaliṅgitā 'nupapannety upadarśayann āha -- nanu tasyaiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5011: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayā 'vasthāpitas tasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ity anena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
SA15arhebt_u:5012: tad eva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5013: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya 1pratipattāv eva[683]siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ[684]sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:5014: tataḥ kasyedānīṃ tatpratipattāv eva sādhyapratītau satyāṃ talliṅgam[685]? /
SA15arhebt_u:5016: jijñāsitasya ghaṭābhāvasya siddher anyasya kasyacid ajijñāsitatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5018: ca yad etad uttarakālaṃ `yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśas tatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ` iti [S. 177b.] anvayasyānugamāmanu(gamanam anu)
SA15arhebt_u:5019: saraṇam, tac ca nirarthakam ādāv eva sādhyapratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5020: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
SA15arhebt_u:5021_0: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5021_1: yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:5022: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5023: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5024: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5025: na hy atra sādhyasādhanayor virodhaḥ saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5026: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5027: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor virodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5028: naiva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tadabhāva iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:5030: [kumārilas tu manyate bhāvāṃśād bhinno '] [S. 179a.] yam abhāvāṃśas tato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5032: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yad āha --
SA15arhebt_u:5033: na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā//
SA15arhebt_u:5041: tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
SA15arhebt_u:5042_0: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā
SA15arhebt_u:5042_1: tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva
SA15arhebt_u:5042_2: bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
SA15arhebt_u:5043: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti yāvat /
SA15arhebt_u:5044: evaṃ manyate -- yo 'yam abhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ [S. 179a.] tadrūpavaikalyād evānubhavati nānyathā /
SA15arhebt_u:5048: na hi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvam anubhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5051: sarvaṃ ca viśvam ekaṃ dravyaṃ prasajyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:5053: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syād ity avaśyam anyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
SA15arhebt_u:5055: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyabhāvābhāvasaṃyoga [T. 342b.] iti kim ucyate --
SA15arhebt_u:5059: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyābhāvātmake[690]eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya {p. 189.1} yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5060: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5063_1: darśayann āha -- anyathā yadi tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti neṣyate[691]tadā
SA15arhebt_u:5063_2: tasya anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya avyavacchede anirākaraṇe
SA15arhebt_u:5063_3: tadabhāvāpratipattau tatpariccheda eva na syāt -- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattir eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5065_0: tadatadrūpayoḥ tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5065_1: yac cātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ avivekād avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanād
SA15arhebt_u:5066: sakalapararūpāsaṅkīrṇaṃ hi tadrūpam tac cet [T. 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathan tena tatparicchedaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5067: syāt? / na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /
SA15arhebt_u:5068: pratiniyatarūpānukāre vā tatparicchedasya katham anyā 'vyavacchedo nāma? /
SA15arhebt_u:5072_0: ity ata āha -- ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarvajanapratītaḥ kasyacid agnyāder vastuno darśanāt
SA15arhebt_u:5072_1: kvaciddeśe tatsambandhini [S. 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5074: na hi yasmād ayaṃpratipattā analaṃpaśyann api saṅkīrṇatadatadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:5076: tathā hi -- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacid etaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:5077: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān {p. 190.1} pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salilādikam? /
SA15arhebt_u:5078: kin tu saṅkīrṇarūpavastupratibhāsijñānatayā salilādikam api paśyati /
SA15arhebt_u:5079: tataḥ kathaṃ salilārthītatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta? /
SA15arhebt_u:5082: yas tu salilābhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasyānupalambhena /
SA15arhebt_u:5083: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5084: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5085: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5086: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5090: kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti param abhyupagamayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5093: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5094: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15arhebt_u:5096: na hi rūpajñānād rasādyabhāvapratītir yuktamatī [T. 344a.] deśādiviprakarṣavato vā /
SA15arhebt_u:5098: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:5100: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5102: [S. 181b.] tuccharūpo 'nupalambhas tadā katham {p. 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:5104: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5105: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5106: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5108: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:5109: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
SA15arhebt_u:5110: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5111: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya [T. 344b.] tadātmakatvān na tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5112: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5115: vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:5119_0: prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītir na yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaś ca jñānasya
SA15arhebt_u:5119_1: pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate tasmād ayam analadarśī pratipattā 'nalaṃ paśyann
SA15arhebt_u:5119_2: api saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena `analo 'yaṃ na salilam` iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃś
SA15arhebt_u:5119_3: ca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta nāpi pratiṣṭheta
SA15arhebt_u:5120: tathā hi -- salilaṃ nāma tad ucyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ[694]sakalatadanyarūpāsaṅkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
SA15arhebt_u:5121: idaṃ tv anyad eva śabalarūpaṃ kim apy avabhāsata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5122: {p. 192.1} tataśca pravṛttinivṛttiyor viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt dustaraṃvyasanaṃpratipattuḥsyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5123: atra parasya [S. 182b.] vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- tata eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5124: na mayā [T. 345a.] salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tuccharūpāt tadabhāvagatir ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5126: kin tu yad etad ekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatir bhavati `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` iti vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5129: tathā hi -- tasmin dṛśyamāne tadevāstīty avagacchatu,
SA15arhebt_u:5130: tadanyat tu nāstīti kim iti pratyetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5131: tasyaiva paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ kevalasya salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya darśanād analajñāne pratibhāsanāt `salilaṃ nāsti` iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5132: tathā hi -- anala iva salilam api yadi tatrābhāviṣyat tadapy analavad darśane pratyabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5133: tasmād ekapratibhāsanam anyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ity anyābhāve tato jñānam utpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5135: tadrūpatayaiva[695]ca tajjñānam anyat[696]pratiyad evaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā[697]tadayogād[698]ity anyapratipattir eva tadabhāvavikalpahetur iti siddhāntavādy āha
SA15arhebt_u:5137: nanv asmābhir idam eva prāg abhihitaṃ tayoḥsatoḥnaikarūpaniyatāpratipattiḥ asambhavāt[699] ity ādibhir vacanaiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5138: tato yad evānyāsaṃsarggiṇaḥ kevalasya [T. 345b.] pratibhāsanaṃ tad eva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
SA15arhebt_u:5139: tasyaiva kevalasya tadanyābhāvātmakatvād anyasya cābhāvāṃśasya nirastatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5140: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tadbalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ {p. 193.1} vikalpakam ājāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5142: yatas tadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakam apy anavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthag abhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5143: tathā hi -- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5145: na hi vikalpajñānasyāpi tadākāraśūnyarūpasaṃvedanād anyat tadabhāvasaṃvedanaṃ nāma /
SA15arhebt_u:5148: anale `analo 'trāsti` iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt_u:5149: tathā nāstitājñānam api vikalpakaṃ tatphaladvāreṇa vā 'nyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthag abhāvākhyaṃ [S. 183b.] pramāṇam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5150: tasmād yad evāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tadanyābhāvapratītiṃ prati,
SA15arhebt_u:5151: tad eva tvayā 'py abhidhīyata iti kasmāt puruṣam ivābhāti yatas tadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇam abhyupagatam ity upahasati /
SA15arhebt_u:5152: tathā hy agaty edānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedam eva kiṃ na pūrvam evābhihitam?
SA15arhebt_u:5153: , yata ālajālābhidhānena ''tmā parikleśita [T. 346a.] ity upasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tīrādarśineva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5154: yathā kila vahanārūḍhair vaṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5155: sa yadā sarvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīraṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanam evāgacchati tadvad etad api draṣṭavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5156: yataś cāvaśyābhyupagamanīyo 'yaṃ pakṣas tasmān na kiñcid anayā 'vidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā
SA15arhebt_u:5158_0: tad evaṃ parasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor liṅgaliṅgibhāvam icchataḥ sambandhābhāvād[700]asāv
SA15arhebt_u:5158_1: ayuktaḥ iti pratipādite pareṇa `asati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyā 'pi tadabhāvagatir
SA15arhebt_u:5158_2: na syāt` iti codite `na vai kutaścit sambandhād` ity ādy abhihitam /
SA15arhebt_u:5159_0: tataḥ `anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo 'nyabhāvagatir eva ca tadabhāvagatiḥ` iti prasādhayatākumārilaparikalpitaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5159_1: kasyacid abhāvaniścayārtham abhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu --
SA15arhebt_u:5162: ity etad āhatya nirākartuṃ [S. 184a.] pūrvapakṣam utthāpayann āha -- yady ekaparicchedād eva ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:5439: svabhāvānupalabdhau svabhāvasyāsadvyavahārasya siddhir anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvasiddhir yā saivāsadvyavahārasiddhihetutvād evam ucyate /

SA15arhebt_u:5444: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāv apy abhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ity āha -- svabhāvānupalabdhau tu ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:5451_1: asadvyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ity evam iṣyamāṇe [T. 354a.][S. 192b.] sati kathaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5452: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate -- yatra yatrāgnir nāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,

SA15arhebt_u:5458: tathā ca katham aśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
SA15arhebt_u:5460: tasmāt kvacid adarśanamātrād eva vyatireka eṣṭavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5463_0: siddhāntavādy āha -- naiva parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ prayogo [S. 193.a]
SA15arhebt_u:5463_1: vyatirekopadarśanakāle pramāṇatayā kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā 'nupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5465: liṅgasya kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā aniścayāt tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca [T. 354b.] sandigdhatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5468_1: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe ca sambandhe sādhite
SA15arhebt_u:5468_2: siddhasambandhayor yady abhāvo yatra yatrābhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi kāryasya vyāpyasya
SA15arhebt_u:5470: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma
SA15arhebt_u:5471: syād ity etasyārthasya darśanārtham ete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyeta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5472: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād bhavati? /
SA15arhebt_u:5473: na hy apratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5474: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid ekabhāvābhāvayor aparasya [S. 193b.] bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe / tathā cāha --
SA15arhebt_u:5476: pramāṇasiddhe saty avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
SA15arhebt_u:5477: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpy abhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5479_0: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvas tatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ[726]anyathā tasya nairātmyam
SA15arhebt_u:5479_1: eva syād iti vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti
SA15arhebt_u:5485_0: evaṃ kāraysvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād anvayavyatirekasadbhāvo
SA15arhebt_u:5485_1: nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharann {p. 205.1} āha -- iti eṣa eva [S. 194a.] svabhāvakāryānupalabdhilakṣaṇaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5486: yataś cānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tadaṃśena vyāpto 'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpter niścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt_u:5487_0: [T. 355b.] tataś ca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva trirūpa eva trividha eva
SA15arhebt_u:5487_1: hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt
SA15arhebt_u:5488: kasmāt trilakṣāṇa eva trividha eva hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
SA15arhebt_u:5489: / svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvam iti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
SA15arhebt_u:5491_0: tad anena `tridhaiva sa` ity asya trilakṣaṇa eva sa hetur avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya
SA15arhebt_u:5492_0: ca rūpāntarakalpanāyām api hetvābhāsās tato 'pare yathoktatrilakṣaṇād apare rūpāntarayogitayā
SA15arhebt_u:5497: yaduktaṃ `trilakṣaṇa eva hetur nānyalakṣaṇaḥ` iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayann āha -- ṣaḍlakṣaṇo hetur ity aparenaiyāyika-mīmāṃsakādayo manyante /
SA15arhebt_u:5498: kāni punaḥ ṣaḍrūpāṇi hetos tair iṣyaṃte?
SA15arhebt_u:5501: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparaṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5503: ekā saṃkhyā yasya {p. 206.1} hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitam ekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyam āśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5504: yady ekasaṃkhyāvyavacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyām api 1dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyām iti[728]/
SA15arhebt_u:5508: na hy ajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ [T. 356b.] iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5509: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yad etad abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakā 'vinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthag anyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5510: tadātmakaṃ tu tadvacanenaivoktam iti na vaktavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5513: tathā hi -- saty apy avinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānair abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5516: tam eva virodhaṃ sādhayann āha -- avinābhāvo hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5517: saty eva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetor avinābhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5519: yadi hi saty eva tasmiṃs tadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartteta tadā 'sya bhrāntatvād apramāṇataiva syāt
SA15arhebt_u:5521: tataḥ sa hetuḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ sādhyāvinābhāvī dharmiṇi syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5524_0: tasmād avinābhāvasya pramāṇabādhāyāś ca sahānavasthānam avinābhāvenopasthāpitasya
SA15arhebt_u:5524_1: dharmiṇi sādhyadharmabhāvasya pramāṇabādhopasthāpitasya ca tadabhāvasya parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā
SA15arhebt_u:5525: tam eva virodhaṃ saṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha -- pratyakṣānumāne hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5528_0: tasmiṃś ca sādhyadharme saty eva tadavinābhāvitvād dhetur bhavaṃs taṃ {p. 207.1}
SA15arhebt_u:5528_1: sādhyadharmaṃ niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt tatraiva dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti
SA15arhebt_u:5528_2: paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vata bhāvānāṃ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate /
SA15arhebt_u:5529: tathā hi -- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchvāsitayā maraṇam eva prāptam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5530: paro bādhā 'vinābhāvayor viṣayabhedād avirodhaṃ darśayann āha -- anyatra sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī hetur na punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇy eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5531: tataḥ [S. 196-7a.] kuto bādhā 'vinābhāvayor virodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanād anyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5532: tathā caivaṃvidhe saty api avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5533_0: evaṃvidhāvinābhāvopagame saty apy abādhitaviṣayatvādike rūpantare hetvābhāsās tato
SA15arhebt_u:5533_1: 'pare rūpāntarasambhavina ity āpāditāṃ hetvābhāsatāṃ vivarītuṃ paropahāsapūrvakam
SA15arhebt_u:5533_2: āha -- tat kim ayaṃ sādhyadharmī tapasvī varākaḥ śaḍḍh(ṇḍha)
SA15arhebt_u:5534: m udvāhya tasmin sādhyadharmasādhanaśāktivikalaṃ [T. 357b.] hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmalakṣaṇaṃ putraṃmṛgayate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5535: etad eva vyanakti -- yasya hetor ddharmiṇy asaty api sādhyadharme bhāva iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5537: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ sādhyadharmiṇy upadarśya kathaṃ dharmī sādhyadharmavān ity ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5538: na hy 'mbhastvasya[730]samudre[731]lavaṇatvenāvinābhave 'pi tadvyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5539: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- ata eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5540: etad eva vivṛnoti -- syād etad bhavato matam /
SA15arhebt_u:5541: yata eva hetur anyathā 'pi sādhyadharmam antareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhaved ambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5542: sādhyadharmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyām abādhitadharmā dharmīty ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5543: yadi {p. 108.1} pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ sādhyadharmiṇi [s. 196-7b.] hetor viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmo na bādhyate yathā 'mbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
SA15arhebt_u:5546: tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddher anabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5547_0: siddhāntavādy āha -- tat kim idānīṃ [T. 358a.] yadā hetor dharmiṇy avinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt
SA15arhebt_u:5547_1: sādhyasiddher abhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaram abādhitaviṣayatvam ucyate tadā hetor
SA15arhebt_u:5548: kasmāt? abādhayaiva hetum antareṇāpi sādhyasiddheḥ akiñcitkara eva hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5549: tathā hy atra kalpanādvaiyam -- bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād? aniyato vā? /
SA15arhebt_u:5550: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpas tadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5552: tasmād abādhāyāṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpy abhāvāt sādhyasiddheḥ bhavaty eveti vyartha eva hetur iti nopanyasanīya eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5554: syān matam -- mā bhūd bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
SA15arhebt_u:5555: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi varttate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane
SA15arhebt_u:5556: sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [S. 198a.] āha -- bādhāyām api iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5557_0: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ varttate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punar
SA15arhebt_u:5557_1: brahnaṇāpi tadbhāvasya karttum aśakyatvāt kim aṅga 3punaḥ śaṣṭhena hetuneti[732]kutaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5558: ata [T. 358b.] eva hi bhavadbhir abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5559_0: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pibhāvād iti dvitīyaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5559_1: pakṣa iṣyate tad apy abādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayann āha -- aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau
SA15arhebt_u:5560: na ca -- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhyasādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhyābhāvasya smbhavād iti tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
SA15arhebt_u:5561: yad uktam -- abādhayaiva sādhyasiddher vyartho hetuḥ iti tatrānyathārtham abādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayann āhaparaḥ-- na bādhāyā abhāvo samābādhā 'bhimatā /
SA15arhebt_u:5564: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyā sambhave 'pi syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5565_1: hetur abhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ. tadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan
SA15arhebt_u:5566_0: siddhāntavādy āha -- kiṃ nu vai hetur bādhāyā yā upalabdhis tasyāḥ bibheti na punar
SA15arhebt_u:5566_1: bbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīm apy anādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5567: kadācitparo brūyāt -- kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānā'pi bādhā tapasvinī,
SA15arhebt_u:5569: tasmāt tata eva hetor bhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evety ata āha -- sa tarhi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5570: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kim asti nāstīty etadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
SA15arhebt_u:5571: kadācit paro brūyāt -- uktam evaitat kim arthaṃ pṛccyate?
SA15arhebt_u:5574: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha -- sādhyasiddhyartham iti bādhakapratyayābhāve prāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhir avirūddhaiveti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5575: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhim asambhāvayan pṛcchati sa kiṃkvacid ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5576: kiṃ [S. 199a.] punar asau hetuḥ satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed iti sambhavyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāva viniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate
SA15arhebt_u:5579: tathā satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthyopagame saty abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5581: bādhāyām api satyām asya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt sāmarthyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5582: tad dhi hetor lakṣaṇam ucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5584: nābādhitaviṣayatvam ity ata āha -- tathāca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5585: evaṃ sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tām abhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5586_0: yadi hi bādhām abhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadā 'nupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5586_1: saṃśayāt -- satām api keśāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt -- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge
SA15arhebt_u:5587: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣam abhyupetyaiva pravarttate /
SA15arhebt_u:5588: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tām abhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāv api prayujyatām,
SA15arhebt_u:5589_0: bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvābhyupagame sati tadupalambhānupalambhayor viśeṣābhāvād iti nānupalabhyamānabādhatvam
SA15arhebt_u:5589_1: api [S. 199b.] hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'py asati pratibandhe
SA15arhebt_u:5590: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- na bādhāyām ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5591: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam iṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe 'pi prayogaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:5592: siddhāntavādy āha -- yady evaṃ bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetur asamartho yadīṣyate tadā 'nirṇīto adhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃbādhā 'nupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
SA15arhebt_u:5594: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhasvapakṣe prayuktasyāpi hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau 1asāmarthyam iti[733]/
SA15arhebt_u:5595_1: avaśyam arthānām asattvād dhetoḥ sāmathyam iti cen manyase siddhāntavādy āha -- kim
SA15arhebt_u:5602: , yato hetor bbādhāyāḥ sambhavakṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhaved iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5604: [S. 200a.] pramāṇatayopagatasyāpy udayakāle 'nupalabdhabādhasya {p. 211.1} kālāntareṇa bādhakapratyayotpāde saty aprāmāṇyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5607: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtter ity āha -- tathāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5612: tathā hi -- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhas tatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /

SA15arhebt_u:5784: api ca -- apradarśitapratihetor hetor hetutve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam -- kiṃ paramārthato hetus taddharmabhāvī,
SA15arhebt_u:5786: tatrādyaṃ vikalpam adhikṛtyāha -- sa ca hetur yo 'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5787_0: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ eva tasmin sādhyadharme satyeva bhavati ity evaṃśīlo 'smad upavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt
SA15arhebt_u:5787_1: [T. 367b.] yadīṣyate tadākatham anyathākriyeta hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5790_0: vastūnāṃ [S. 208b.] hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ -- `saty eva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ`
SA15arhebt_u:5790_1: -- tadanyathābhāvasya tadviparyayasya abhāvād ubhayoś ca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve
SA15arhebt_u:5790_2: {p. 220.1} svabhāvata eva dharmiṇy ekatra tayor bhāve viruddāv ubhau svabhāvāv ekasya syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:5794: asaty api sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt katham anyadā'pi apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām api sādhanaṃkasyacit? /
SA15arhebt_u:5798: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5799_0: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaś caiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena [S. 209.1a.]
SA15arhebt_u:5799_2: kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavād alakṣaṇam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5803: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayor na bhavaty eveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5804: tad evam anayor dvayo rūpayor yaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā 'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti hetvābhāsās tato 'para iti ity asyārtho vivṛta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5806_0: abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor evāvinābhāve sati
SA15arhebt_u:5806_1: bādhāpratihetvor asambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena saty api liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5812: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpam iti [T. 368b.] kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
SA15arhebt_u:5813: yady api vikalpapratibhāsī sāmanyākāro liṅgatayā 'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
SA15arhebt_u:5814: na hy asau svatantra eva liṅgam /
SA15arhebt_u:5815: yad āha -- vikalpabhedāna {p. 221.1} svatantrāṇām anvarthāśrayaṇāt tatkalpitaviṣayāda[766]'rthapratipattāv[767] anarthapratilambha eva syāt iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5818_0: vastudarśanahāneḥ[768]svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayāc ca taddharmatām eva tv anusmaranto
SA15arhebt_u:5818_1: vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān[769]saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhād avisaṃvādakāḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5819: na ca tasya kāryāder ātmarūpaṃ [S. 209.2a.] jñātam /
SA15arhebt_u:5823: yasmād abāhyāsyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'py anuyāyitayā sāmānyāmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatayā kutaḥ? yadā ''ha --
SA15arhebt_u:5828: etad eva sādhayann āha -- kiṃrūpād ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5829_0: kim ātmakāt hetor anumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ prakṛtāyāṃ pratipattuḥ puṃso
SA15arhebt_u:5829_1: yad avisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ [T. 369a.] yasya
SA15arhebt_u:5829_2: rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ôyatra tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalam
SA15arhebt_u:5829_3: asādhanamô iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt
SA15arhebt_u:5830: tathā, etasmiṃś ca nyāye [S. 209.2b.] vyavasthite yad asya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tal lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5831: syād etad -- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatety ata āha -- pratipattijanmani ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5832: yady anumeyapratītijanmany upayujyate jñānam iti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt_u:5833_0: tam evāha -- evaṃpratipattijanmany upayogamātrāl liṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya arthasya
SA15arhebt_u:5833_1: puruṣasya {p. 222.1} pramātuḥ adi śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnām ālokamanaskārādīnāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5834: atra kāraṇam āha -- na hi teṣv api prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
SA15arhebt_u:5835: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- niścitagrahaṇaṃtarhi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5836: yadi pararūpatvāj jñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yad etadācāryeṇa --
SA15arhebt_u:5839: niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavataś cābhimataṃ [T. 369b.] tan na karttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5840: tathā hi -- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5842: jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5843: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S. 210a.] niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanād anyārthatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5844: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5845: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5846: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:5847: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5849_0: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca
SA15arhebt_u:5849_1: sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity
SA15arhebt_u:5849_2: asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5850: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
SA15arhebt_u:5852: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5854: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
SA15arhebt_u:5857: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5858: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5859: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetum icchanti,
SA15arhebt_u:5862: iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5863: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5864: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5865: pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ kvacid bhāvābhāvayoḥ kathañciddarśanādarśanasambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5866_0: tasmād [S. 211a.] yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
SA15arhebt_u:5866_1: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5868: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5871: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5872: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti,
SA15arhebt_u:5875: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttir yady apy ākṣipyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5876: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:5877: ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:5878: [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5880: ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5881: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1} sidhyanti,
SA15arhebt_u:5883: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5884: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi tatsādhanaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5886: kiñ ca, parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5887: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati?
SA15arhebt_u:5889_0: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim
SA15arhebt_u:5889_1: ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye
SA15arhebt_u:5890: na teśāṃ tatas trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5892: yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate tathāpi tāv eva
SA15arhebt_u:5893: liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5894_0: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ --
SA15arhebt_u:5894_1: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5895: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt_u:5896_0: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau
SA15arhebt_u:5896_1: bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi
SA15arhebt_u:5896_2: saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5898: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5899: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5901: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5903: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5904: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5905: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
SA15arhebt_u:5907: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato 'pi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5910: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5912: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5913: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt_u:5916: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5917: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5919: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5921: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5925: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5927: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5928: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5929: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5930: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5933: yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)
SA15arhebt_u:5938: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5939: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5942: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5946: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5948: tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15arhebt_u:5951: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5952: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5954: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:5955: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5958: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5959: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5960: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5963: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5964: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S. 214b.] pratipādanāl
SA15arhebt_u:5965: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5966_0: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau
SA15arhebt_u:5966_1: bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau
SA15arhebt_u:5967: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
SA15arhebt_u:5968: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5971: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5972_0: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta
SA15arhebt_u:5972_1: iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p.
SA15arhebt_u:5972_2: 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5975: tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt_u:5976: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5977: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt_u:5978: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5979: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5980: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt_u:5981: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:5983: tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha -- naivam,
SA15arhebt_u:5988: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:5989: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5990: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
SA15arhebt_u:5992: athāvi(pi )jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:5993: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5995: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
